Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: A simple prayer to the Virgin — a quatrain concluding 758

HunHM127.Transcription:
Lady for þese ioyes seueneAnd for þi gladnesse
                    fiveBringe me to þe blisse of heueneþorwe grace of clene
                    lyfe
